000.name: Jake
000.text: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

001.name: Emily
001.text: Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself? It was two-tired!

002.name: Alex
002.text: What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!

003.name: Sophia
003.text: Why don't eggs tell jokes? Because they might crack up!
